QuestData.Title: Not a Bug
QuestData.Description: Alright, $g friend:missy;, time to plant a bug.$b$bRelax, it's not a bug exactly, but it'll serve our purposes.$b$bIn the northern portion of Aldur'thar, the cult's void summoners enslave demonic minions. Use this rod to siphon the dark matter from the corpses of these enslaved minions, and then use the cultists' summoning crystal to bring our little spy into being.$b$bUntil it is discovered, the messenger will serve as our eyes and ears, discreetly observing the actions of our enemy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Koltira, aboard Orgrim's Hammer, wants you to collect 5 Dark Matters and summon a Dark Messenger at Aldur'thar.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $c.$b$bThe messenger has already turned up some valuable information.
